attributes.action: challenge Pevensey council re. planning for a bungalow for a 19 yr old who lost both
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: legs in Afghanistan.  (they say his case was not exceptional enough for them to waive strict laws and allow the bungalow to be built).
